sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
**WAirdrops** is already a live, actively used tool that continues to gain traction among Cardano founders and creators. 

[https://wairdrops\.xyz/](https://wairdrops.xyz/)

We originally built it to solve a problem inside the Walkers App: distributing monthly rewards to over 1,000 wallets while covering expensive distribution fees. These fees force many creators to limit or delay rewards, shorten campaign periods, or reduce engagement. This is why most projects distribute rewards **quarterly or even bi\-yearly**—to avoid the high cost of large-volume transactions.

WAirdrops removes these constraints entirely. It is the first completely **free** Cardano tool that enables creators to launch **ADA, NFT, and CNT airdrop campaigns** to unlimited wallets with unlimited supplies and zero fees. This allows founders to redirect resources back into development, product growth, and community building, instead of spending funds on distribution overhead.

With the proposed upgrade, creators gain the ability to run **fully automated social\-task campaigns \(Twitter/X, Discord\)** directly from the dashboard. Participants complete tasks, earn badges, collect points and XP, and progress through leaderboards ending with automatic distribution through the claim portal.

This upgrade also introduces **multitoken baskets**, allowing creators to airdrop multiple tokens, NFTs, and assets in a **single unified claim**. This significantly increases distribution flexibility and allows more creative reward structures, cross-project collaborations, and package-style airdrops that were not possible before.

**What makes WAirdrops truly innovative and unmatched on Cardano:**

- It transforms airdrops into gamified marketing systems, boosting user engagement, holder growth, and viral participation.
- It enables massive high-frequency airdrops, unlocking thousands of microtransactions per campaign—activity that projects previously avoided because of fees.By removing costs entirely, it encourages creators to drop rewards weekly or even daily, dramatically increasing on-chain microtransaction volume.
- It supports ADA, CNTs, NFTs, and now multitoken baskets, all from one simple dashboard—something no other tool on Cardano offers.
- It provides instant access to a verified, active user base, including more than 2,000 daily Walkers App users, ensuring immediate adoption.
- It unifies social tasks, quests, badges, XP, leaderboards, and distribution, creating a full end-to-end campaign environment unlike any existing airdrop tool.It empowers founders to run unlimited, scalable airdrops that encourage long-term user engagement rather than one-off drops.



No existing Cardano product combines free, unlimited multi-asset airdrops, social task automation, gamification, multitoken baskets, and high-volume microtransaction generation inside a single platform. WAirdrops opens a new pathway for ecosystem growth, creator freedom, and continuous on-chain activity that has never existed before.

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
A **fully functional MVP** already proves the concept. WAirdrops removes the barriers that prevent creators from executing regular airdrops, increases on-chain activity through frequent microtransactions, and eliminates delays in distributing rewards.

The MVP is live and available here: [https://wairdrops\.xyz/](https://wairdrops.xyz/)

WAirdrops is currently an open platform that anyone can use. Since launch, multiple airdrops have been successfully completed, and its usage continues to grow. Creators are already using it to distribute ADA, CNTs, and NFTs with a simple and intuitive setup process.

Setting up an airdrop is straightforward: creators can upload WL wallets or add them manually, attach the original asset image via policy ID, and set start and end dates. All distribution history is stored for full transparency, and any unclaimed tokens can be withdrawn by creators once the campaign ends.

[https://drive\.google\.com/file/d/1T2OtlRz85zQr0HeKHj7tKVmxmFTk\_MSB/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1T2OtlRz85zQr0HeKHj7tKVmxmFTk_MSB/view?usp=sharing)

[https://drive\.google\.com/file/d/1qPwh5k2YH0YYUWvRf8orpj8u48dclcXE/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qPwh5k2YH0YYUWvRf8orpj8u48dclcXE/view?usp=sharing)

With this proposed upgrade, we will also integrate token basket distributions, allowing creators to drop multiple assets in a single campaign.

For users, the experience is effortless. When they connect their wallet, they can instantly see all active airdrops and supplies they are eligible for. This makes participation simple, clear, and rewarding.

**Walkers is already powering airdrop campaigns** for many projects ahead of their presales, NFT mints, or major announcements. Through these campaigns we promote partner projects to the entire Walkers user base while onboarding new users into the Walkers ecosystem. 

[https://drive\.google\.com/file/d/1vH76oMcW8BY8Pv7ZN4e91ZlQo8FxLdqT/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1vH76oMcW8BY8Pv7ZN4e91ZlQo8FxLdqT/view?usp=sharing)



With **2,000 daily active users** 40% coming from web2 we have repeatedly onboarded new holders into the projects using our services and generated significant microtransactions through social-connected campaigns.

With this upgrade, creators will gain the ability to run full social-task airdrop campaigns:

- customizable tasks
- integration with all relevant socials
- leaderboards
- XP and points
- badges for completed actions

and automated reward claiming through the WAirdrops platform

This creates a complete, gamified campaign system made for both creators and users designed to scale engagement and maximize on-chain activity.

sub_fields.title: Describe realistic measures of success, ideally with on-chain metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
The success of this platform will be measured by the volume of **microtransactions** it generates. With Walkers rapidly growing user base currently 2,000 daily active users along with planned expansion to other chains, Midnight integration, and simplified Web2 onboarding, we anticipate usage to scale rapidly. 

As more projects adopt the platform to run campaigns and reward their communities, we aim to achieve **20,000 microtransactions/month** within the first year after full release, with strong potential for continuous growth and long-term expansion. The initial focus is on the Walkers App user base, with the potential to grow to millions of users within a few years.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
**The challenge most Cardano projects \(companies\) face is that distributing tokens, ADA, or NFTs to a large community of users is both technically complex and financially draining\. Every transaction costs fees, and when projects try to reward hundreds or thousands of wallets, the costs quickly become unsustainable\. As a result, many teams either limit their airdrops, stretch them over long periods, or abandon them altogether which reduces user trust, engagement, and overall growth\.**

WAirdrop solves this problem by introducing the first free airdrop platform on Cardano, specifically designed for creators and projects of all sizes.

**Unlike existing solutions that charge projects high costs to send tokens, WAirdrop flips the model:**

Creators pay nothing to run airdrops

Users pay a small claim fee when they collect their rewards.

This ensures the system is sustainable, fair, and removes the financial barrier for projects to engage their communities.

**What makes WAirdrop unique is the all\-in\-one capability:**

Projects can airdrop ADA, CNTs, NFTs, and multiple-token baskets from a single platform.

Distribution can be done to unlimited wallets and unlimited supply amounts, with full on-chain transaction history for transparency.

A built-in withdrawal function allows creators to easily reclaim any unclaimed tokens or NFTs.

**In addition, WAirdrop is not just a distribution tool it is a marketing engine\.**

Creators will be able to set up full airdrop campaigns directly from the platform, linking them with Walkers App tasks (engagement activities) with more socials API integrations. This transforms airdrops from simple token drops into engagement campaigns that drive both community growth and user participation. 

**The impact is two\-fold:**

For creators and projects – no longer limited by budget, they can scale community rewards, loyalty programs, and rewards distributions without worrying about transaction costs.

For the Cardano blockchain – every campaign creates more wallet activity, more token transactions, and more engaged communities, boosting the entire chain’s adoption and usage.

A functional MVP already proves the concept. With Walkers, we have successfully executed airdrop campaigns for over 20 projects, both before token TGE and during key activities. By making airdrops accessible, scalable, and tied to real engagement tools, WAirdrop removes a major barrier to community-driven growth and lays the groundwork for stronger, more sustainable ecosystems.

[https://wairdrops\.xyz/](https://wairdrops.xyz/)

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
WAirdrop is designed not only to help individual projects but to strengthen the entire Cardano blockchain,by solving one of its most persistent challenges: **efficient and scalable token distribution\.**

By making airdrops **free** for creators and sustainable for users, WAirdrop encourages more projects to actively engage their communities and launch rewards programs without being constrained by high transaction costs or technical complexity.

**Key impacts include:**

Increased On-Chain Activity

Every airdrop involves token transfers, claims, and interactions with smart contracts. This drives measurable on-chain activity, increasing wallet usage and demonstrating real utility for ADA, NFTs, CNTs, and other tokens. High on-chain engagement

**Boosted Community Engagement**

By linking airdrops with Walkers App tasks and social API's , WAirdrop transforms token distribution into interactive, gamified campaigns.

This encourages users to engage more deeply with projects, creating communities that are more likely to hold tokens, participate in governance, and support future initiatives.

**Support for Emerging Projects**

Many small and mid-sized projects on Cardano struggle to fund large airdrops. WAirdrop removes this barrier, allowing any project to reward its community and grow its user base efficiently.

This inclusivity helps diversify the ecosystem, bringing in new ideas, tokens, and applications that increase Cardano’s overall value proposition.

**Education and Adoption**

As more users participate in airdrop campaigns, they become familiar with wallets, smart contracts, and token interactions, lowering the barrier to entry for Cardano adoption.

Integration with apps like Walkers introduces Web2 users to blockchain through gamified experiences, expanding the audience beyond existing crypto enthusiasts.

**Long\-Term Ecosystem Growth**

Sustainable, large-scale airdrops increase liquidity and circulation of tokens, supporting market activity.

By connecting rewards to real engagement , WAirdrop encourages continuous interaction, helping projects retain users over time and contributing to a healthier, more resilient ecosystem.

In summary, **WAirdrop accelerates Cardano adoption, strengthens community engagement, and supports both established and emerging projects by providing a scalable, free, and user\-friendly airdrop solution\. This directly contributes to Cardano’s growth, visibility, and long\-term ecosystem sustainability\.**

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer: WAirdrop offers outstanding value by giving creators a free, fully integrated, and scalable platform to launch airdrop campaigns, connect with app-based tasks, and engage unlimited users without expensive barriers. With the ever-growing volume of microtransactions on Cardano, including powerful onboarding tools, the platform ensures seamless reach and impact for every campaign.
